item.title: Test1
item.description: å½’å¹¶æ’åº import java.io.*; public class Main { static int[] brr = new int[100005]; static int[] arr = new int[100005]; static int n; public static void merge_sort(int l, int r) { if (l == r) { brr[l] = arr[l]; return; } int mid = l + r >> 1; int left = l; int right = mid + 1; int pos = l; merge_sort(l, mid); merge_sort(mid + 1, r); while (pos <= r) { if (left > mid) { brr[pos++] = arr[right++]; } else if (right > r) { brr[pos++] = arr[left++]; } else { if (arr[left] > arr[right]) { brr[pos++] = arr[right++]; } else { brr[pos++] = arr[left++]; } } } for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) { arr[i] = brr[i]; } } public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException { StreamTokenizer streamTokenizer = new StreamTokenizer(new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.
